creator: douglas.hurbon@mail.cuny.edu
text:
Created attachment 26039
patch for org.apache.lenya.cms.workflow.usecases.Publish

Causes: ERROR usecases.workflow - Could not commit/rollback usecase [workflow.publish]: 
java.lang.NullPointerException
    at org.apache.lenya.cms.site.tree2.SiteTreeRevisionVerifier.eventFired(SiteTreeRevisionVerifier.java:33)

Because the publish uscase creates an event not associated with a document.  This is the source of the NPE.

A patch is attached.

creator: florent.andre-dev@4sengines.com
text:
Patch tested and apply on rev 998192. 

Thanks for this Douglas.
